properties.title: AndroMDA Developer Debugging Hints and Tips

section.name: AndroMDA Developer Debugging
section.p:
This document provides guidelines on debugging the internals of AndroMDA. Logging is managed by
AndroMDALogger .

subsection.name: Overriding log4j settings
subsection.p:
Too override the default log4j settings:.
Create a file log4j.xml
Add a line to your project.properties
maven.andromda.loggingConfigurationUri=file:/some_location/log4j.xml
or other maven file where properties are picked up from.
Modify as required. For more information consult the log4j documentation or this useful tutorial. For pattern settings see
PatternLayout javadoc. The sample one above turns off INFO messages and limits others to WARN apart from the ejb cartridge which is set to DEBUG.
